description.value:
Trigger A creature attempts a flat check to target you because you're concealed or hidden due to fog, haze, mist, or smoke

Effect You shroud yourself in smoke, making it harder for your foe to hit you. If you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed}, the DC of the flat check increases from 5 to 7; if you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden}, it increases from 11 to 13.
